description: codereview.py: Fix issues with leading tabulation in the Files: section of CL description.

messages.text:
Hello imkrasin (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc),

I'd like you to review this change.

Hi Russ,

this is a tiny fix to the issue I experienced with some vim settings: it included the leading tabs before the filename and after that hg diff failed to produce a valid diff.

It fixes the problem for me (and hopefully for some other people) and does not break anything.

can you please mail these with hg mail so that
golang-dev gets cc'ed?

On Wed, Aug 11, 2010 at 01:05,  <imkrasin@gmail.com> wrote:
> Hi Russ,
>
> this is a tiny fix to the issue I experienced with some vim settings: it
> included the leading tabs before the filename and after that hg diff
> failed to produce a valid diff.
>
> It fixes the problem for me (and hopefully for some other people) and
> does not break anything.
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/1943042/show
>

LGTM

will wait until after release to submit

I ran just "hg mail 1943042". I don't know how did he decide that
imkrasin is a reviewer. Probably, it's because I write comments on
codereview.appspot.com from my gmail.com account and I did hg mail
from krasin@golang.org

On Thu, Aug 12, 2010 at 9:36 AM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM
>
> will wait until after release to submit
>

On Wed, Aug 11, 2010 at 22:50, Ivan Krasin <imkrasin@gmail.com> wrote:
> I ran just "hg mail 1943042". I don't know how did he decide that
> imkrasin is a reviewer. Probably, it's because I write comments on
> codereview.appspot.com from my gmail.com account and I did hg mail
> from krasin@golang.org

yes, commenting makes it want to add you to the reviewer list.
you can avoid that by editing the reviewer list to remove yourself
when mailing comments via the web form.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=cb2692d1273b ***

codereview.py: Fix issues with leading tabulation in the Files: section of CL description.

R=imkrasin, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/1943042

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
